name: Descend (Toreole, Spheya)
description:
Descend is a very short game about a raccoon on his way to the afterlife.
Along the way, he meets different other people.

Controls: 
- A/D: Move
- Space: Jump
- E: Talk to NPC (when speech bubble appears)

Disclaimer:
The 2D Lights (as of Unity 2019.4) do not work in HTML builds, and are therefore only present in the Windows Build.
